name: Coinmetro
public_notice: Contract address has changed from 0x44e2ca91cea1147f1b503e669f06cd11fb0c5490 to 0x36ac219f90f5A6A3C77f2a7B660E3cC701f68e25.

description.en: CoinMetro, a one-of-a-kind, licensed, and regulated financial platform that will fuel the future of blockchain innovation. Through a tokenized ecosystem CoinMetro provides a gateway for both novice and professional traders and investors to get involved in the crypto space with an ease of access not yet seen in the industry. Our goal, above all else, is to make sure that your overall CoinMetro experience is nothing short of exemplary.
